meanings.definition: Auditees: the individuals or entities being audited
meanings.sent1: The auditees provided all the necessary documents for the audit.
meanings.sent2: The auditees were cooperative during the audit process.
meanings.sent3: The auditees accidentally brought cookies instead of documents to the audit.
meanings.sent4: The auditees were like detectives searching for clues in their financial records.
meanings.sent5: The auditees were like stars under the scrutiny of the audit spotlight.

meanings.definition: Auditees: those who are subject to an audit
meanings.sent1: All auditees must attend the audit meeting next week.
meanings.sent2: The auditees were nervous about the upcoming audit.
meanings.sent3: The auditees joked about wearing disguises to avoid the audit.
meanings.sent4: The auditees felt like students waiting for their exam results during the audit.
meanings.sent5: The auditees felt the pressure of the audit looming over them.
